verses.verse: But it came to pass inside a while <S%H3117>after<s%>, in the <S%H3117>time<s%> of <S%H2406>wheat<s%> <S%H7105>harvest<s%>, that <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H6485>visited<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> with a <S%H1423>kid<s%>; and he <S%H559>said<s%>, I will go <S%H935>in<s%> to my <S%H802>wife<s%> into the <S%H2315>chamber<s%>. But her <S%H1>father<s%> would not <S%H5414>allow<s%> him to go <S%H935>in<s%>.

And her <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, I <S%H559>truly<s%> <S%H559>thought<s%> that you had <S%H8130>utterly<s%> <S%H8130>hated<s%> <S%H5414>her<s%>; therefore I gave her to your <S%H4828>companion<s%>: is not her <S%H6996>younger<s%> <S%H269>sister<s%> fairer than <S%H2896>she<s%>? take her, I pray you, instead of her.

And <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> concerning <S%H6471>them<s%>, Now shall I be more <S%H5352>blameless<s%> than the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, though I <S%H6213>do<s%> them a <S%H7451>displeasure<s%>.

And <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H3920>caught<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7776>foxes<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3940>firebrands<s%>, and <S%H6437>turned<s%> <S%H2180>tail<s%> to <S%H2180>tail<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H3940>firebrand<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> between <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2180>tails<s%>.

And when he had <S%H1197>set<s%> the <S%H3940>brands<s%> on <S%H784>fire<s%>, he let them <S%H7971>go<s%> into the standing <S%H7054>corn<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, and burnt <S%H1197>up<s%> both the <S%H1430>shocks<s%>, and also the standing <S%H7054>corn<s%>, with the <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> and <S%H2132>olives<s%>.

Then the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Who has <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H559>this<s%>? And they answered, <S%H8123>Samson<s%>, the son in <S%H2860>law<s%> of the <S%H8554>Timnite<s%>, because he had <S%H3947>taken<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%>, and <S%H5414>given<s%> her to his <S%H4828>companion<s%>. And the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%>, and <S%H8313>burnt<s%> her and her <S%H1>father<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>.

And <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H518>them<s%>, Though you have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%>, yet will I be <S%H5358>avenged<s%> of <S%H310>you<s%>, and after that I will <S%H2308>cease<s%>.

And he <S%H5221>struck<s%> them <S%H7785>hip<s%> <S%H5921>and<s%> <S%H3409>thigh<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter<s%>: and he went <S%H3381>down<s%> and <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H5585>top<s%> of the <S%H5553>rock<s%> <S%H5862>Etam<s%>.
Then the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and <S%H5203>spread<s%> themselves in <S%H3896>Lehi<s%>.

And the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Why are you come <S%H5927>up<s%> against <S%H559>us<s%>? And they answered, To <S%H631>bind<s%> <S%H8123>Samson<s%> are we come <S%H5927>up<s%>, to <S%H6213>do<s%> to him as he has done to <S%H6213>us<s%>.

Then <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3381>went<s%> to the <S%H5585>top<s%> of the <S%H5553>rock<s%> <S%H5862>Etam<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8123>Samson<s%>, <S%H3045>Know<s%> you not that the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> are <S%H4910>rulers<s%> over <S%H6213>us<s%>? what is this that you have done unto <S%H559>us<s%>? And he said unto <S%H6213>them<s%>, As they did unto <S%H6213>me<s%>, so have I done unto them.

And they <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3381>him<s%>, We are come down to <S%H631>bind<s%> <S%H5414>you<s%>, that we may deliver you into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>. And <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7650>them<s%>, Swear unto <S%H6293>me<s%>, that you will not fall upon me yourselves.

And they <S%H559>spoke<s%> unto <S%H559>him<s%>, saying, <S%H631>No<s%>; but we will bind you <S%H631>fast<s%>, and <S%H5414>deliver<s%> you into their <S%H3027>hand<s%>: but <S%H4191>surely<s%> we will not <S%H4191>kill<s%> <S%H631>you<s%>. And they bound him with <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H5688>cords<s%>, and brought him <S%H5927>up<s%> from the <S%H5553>rock<s%>.

And when he <S%H935>came<s%> unto <S%H3896>Lehi<s%>, the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H7321>shouted<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> <S%H7307>him<s%>: and the Spirit of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> came <S%H6743>mightily<s%> upon <S%H5688>him<s%>, and the cords that were upon his <S%H2220>arms<s%> became as <S%H6593>flax<s%> that was <S%H1197>burnt<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>, and his <S%H612>bands<s%> <S%H4549>loosed<s%> from off his <S%H3027>hands<s%>.

And he <S%H4672>found<s%> a <S%H2961>new<s%> <S%H3895>jawbone<s%> of an <S%H2543>donkey<s%>, and put <S%H7971>forth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H5221>it<s%>, and killed a <S%H505>thousand<s%> men with <S%H376>it<s%>.

And <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, With the <S%H3895>jawbone<s%> of an <S%H2543>donkey<s%>, <S%H2565>heaps<s%> upon <S%H2565>heaps<s%>, with the <S%H3895>jaw<s%> of an <S%H2543>donkey<s%> have I <S%H5221>slain<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%>.

And it came to <S%H3615>pass<s%>, when he had made an end of <S%H1696>speaking<s%>, that he cast <S%H7993>away<s%> the <S%H3895>jawbone<s%> out of his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H7121>called<s%> that <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H7437>Ramath<s%>–lehi.

And he was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H6770>thirsty<s%>, and <S%H7121>called<s%> on the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, You have <S%H5414>given<s%> this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8668>deliverance<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of your <S%H5650>servant<s%>: and now shall I <S%H4191>die<s%> for <S%H6772>thirst<s%>, and <S%H5307>fall<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%>?

But <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1234>split<s%> an hollow <S%H4388>place<s%> that was in the <S%H3895>jaw<s%>, and there <S%H3318>came<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H8354>thereout<s%>; and when he had drunk, his <S%H7307>spirit<s%> came <S%H7725>again<s%>, and he <S%H2421>revived<s%>: why he <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> there <S%H5875>En<s%>–hakkore, which is in <S%H3896>Lehi<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.
And he <S%H8199>judged<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.
